name: Ludarium-45
description:
The Game of Games Based on 45-Themes. 

Theme 1: You start with Nothing; Collect the Cartridges..

Theme 2/45: TBD..(WIP)

(Play Game 01 of 45)

Controls:

WSAD - Move 

Mouselook - Look

Space - Jump 

Shift / Tab - SpeedRun

Seizure Warning:

Game Contains flashing lights & fast paced motions. Gamer Discretion is advised!

Stimulant-Friendly Edition is in the works!
